slides.title: You've Been Nominated

content.headline: Someone Nominated Your Business
content.subhead: Claim your nomination and get recognized

slides.narration: Great news: someone in the community nominated your business for recognition. They think you're doing something special and deserve to be highlighted. Now you just need to claim your nomination to be considered.

slides.title: Your Nomination

content.headline: Nomination Details

nomination.reason: For outstanding service and community contribution

content.note: Claim within 7 days to be considered

slides.narration: Here are your nomination details. Your business was nominated in the category shown. A community member submitted the nomination because they believe you provide outstanding service and contribute to our community. You have seven days to claim this nomination to be considered for recognition.

slides.title: Recognition Benefits
slides.narration: What do recognized businesses receive? Winner announcement in our newsletter to over ten thousand subscribers. A full news article feature about your business. An award badge to display on your website and marketing materials. Social media spotlight across all channels. A physical certificate for your wall. And featured placement in our directory. Recognition that works for your business.

slides.title: How to Claim
slides.narration: Claiming your nomination is simple. Click 'Claim Nomination.' Verify your business information is correct. Optionally add a brief statement about why you deserve recognition. Submit for consideration. Takes under three minutes. That's it—you're in the running.

slides.title: Claim Now
slides.narration: Ready to claim your nomination? Do it now—takes under three minutes. Or see past winners to see the recognition your business could receive. Your nomination expires in seven days, so don't wait. Someone believes in your business. Let's make it official.
